snippet: A comprehensive review of the government's programs for treating post-traumatic stress disorder in service members and veterans recommends expanded services and even more personnel.
abstract: A comprehensive review of the government's programs for treating post-traumatic stress disorder in service members and veterans recommends expanded services and even more personnel.

headline.main: Study Calls for Better Assessment of Government P.T.S.D. Programs
headline.print_headline: Review Urges Defense Dept. To Broaden P.T.S.D. Help
